alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 04 at 7:30PM CDT until November 04 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Cherokee County in northeastern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 730 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Rusk, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Rusk, New Salem, Ponta, Minden, New Summerfield, Gallatin, Reklaw, Laneville and Brachfield. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
